00064 ImputeEngine * ImputeEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00065 {
00066         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == ImputeEngine::EngineName())
00067                 return (ImputeEngine *)engine;
00068         return NULL;
00069 }

00084 void ImputeEngine::defineOptions() 
00085 {
00086   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00087   defOptMult("", "haplotype-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00088                      "File or know haplotypes, which one row per SNP and one column per haplotype.",
00089                      "");
00090 
00091   defOptMult("l", "legend-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00092                      "Legend file with information about the SNPs in the <-h> (known haplotypes) file.",
00093                      "");
00094 
00095   defineOption("m", "Recombination-map", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00096                      "Fine-scale recombination map.",
00097                      "");
00098 
00099   defineOption("g", "Genotype-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00100                      "File containing genotypes for a study sample in which we want to impute untyped SNPs.",
00101                      "");
00102 
00103   defineOption("", "strand_g", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00104                                         "File for aligning the strand orientation of the <-g> (genotypes) file with the alleles in the reference panel.",
00105                                         "");
00106 
00107   defineOption("", "g_ref", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00108                      "File containing unphased genotypes to use as a reference panel for imputation.  Should follow the same format as the <-g> file.",
00109                      "");
00110 
00111   defineOption("", "strand_g_ref", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00112                      "File specifying strand orientation of genotypes relative to some external reference, such as the Human Genome reference sequence, in the same format as the <-strand_g> file.  This argument is optional, although it is crucial to make sure that the <-g> and <-g-ref> files are aligned with each other (either by making sure they are aligned initially, or aligning each of them to an external reference using the <-strand_g> and <-strand_g_ref> files.",
00113                      "");
00114 
00115   defineOption("", "output", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00116                                         "Name of main output file that will contain the imputed genotypes.",
00117                                         "");
00118 
00119   defineOption("", "o_gz", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00120                                         "Specifies that the output file should be gzipped.",
00121                                         "");
00122 
00123   defineOption("", "int", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00124                                         "Lower and upper boundaries (in base pair position) of region in which to carry out imputation; useful for splitting chromosomes into manageable chunks for analysis.",
00125                     "");
00126 
00127   defineOption("", "Ne", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00128                      "Effective size of the population in which inference is being performed.",
00129                      "11418");
00130 
00131   defineOption("", "buffer", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT,
00132                                         "Length of buffer region (in kb) to include on either side of imputation interval to avoid edge effects.",
00133                                         "0.0");
00134 
00135   defineOption("", "include_snps", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00136                                         "A file containing a list of reference-panel-only SNPs to include in the output file; other SNPs of this type will not be imputed.",
00137                                         "");
00138 
00139   defineOption("", "iter", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00140                                         "Total number of MCMC iterations to perform, including burn-in.  Default is 30.",
00141                                         "-1");
00142 
00143   defineOption("k", "", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00144                                         "Number of 'conditioning states' to use for phasing updates during an MCMC run. Default is 40.",
00145                                         "-1");
00146 
00147   defineOption("", "seed", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00148                                         "Random seed.",
00149                                         "-1");
00150 }

00152 void ImputeEngine::defineStates() { }

00154 /**
00155  * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00156  */
00157 void ImputeEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00158 {
00159     defineStates();
00160         string file;
00161         vector<string> hap_files;
00162         vector<string> legned_files;
00163 
00164         // reference panel can be either haplotype or reference_genotype files
00165         hap_files = getOptVector("haplotype-file");
00166         legned_files = getOptVector("l");
00167 
00168         if (hap_files.size() == 0 && getOpt("g_ref") == "")
00169                 Err::errAbort("Must specify at least one haplotye file or reference genotype file.");
00170 
00171         if (hap_files.size() != 0)
00172         {
00173                 if (legned_files.size() == 0)
00174                         Err::errAbort("Haploid file is used.  Must specify at least one lengend file.");
00175 
00176                 if (hap_files.size() != legned_files.size())
00177                 {
00178                         Err::errAbort("Number of Haplotype files need to be equal to number of legend files.");
00179                 }
00180         }
00181 
00182         if (getOpt("g_ref") != "")
00183         {
00184                 if (getOpt("strand_g_ref") != "")
00185                         Err::errAbort("Reference genotype file is used.  Must specify referenece strand file.");
00186         }
00187 
00188         if (getOpt("g") == "")
00189                 Err::errAbort("Must specify a genotype file.");
00190 
00191         if (getOpt("m") == "")
00192                 Err::errAbort("Must specify a recombination map file.");
00193 
00194         if (getOpt("int") == "")
00195                 Err::errAbort("Must specify lower and upper boundary of a region.");
00196 
00197         // [ToDo], check if int has lower and upper boundary
00198         // and make sure the first is lower than the second
00199         
00200 
00201         if (getOpt("output") == "")
00202                 Err::errAbort("Must specify name of main output file.");
00203 
00204         if (getOpt("strand_g") == "")
00205                 Err::errAbort("Must specify file for aligning the strand orientation.");
00206 
00207         if (getOptInt("Ne") == -1 || getOptInt("Ne") < 0 || getOptInt("Ne") > 30000)
00208                 Err::errAbort("Ne needs to be set in range (0, 30000).");
00209 
00210 }
00211 
00212 // Compute the various metrics over all chips.
00213 void ImputeEngine::runImp() {
00214 /*
00215         SnpSummaryReporter reporter;
00216         int size = getOptInt("buffer-size");
00217 
00218         bool rc = reporter.CreateSnpSummaryReport(getOpt("summary-out-file"), getOptVector("chps"), getOpt("output-format"), size, getOpt("call-file"));        
00219     if(!rc)
00220         Err::errAbort("Unable to extract SNP summaries.");
00221 */
00222 
00223         // copied from impute.cc
00224         
00225   long int seed = -1;
00226   int i, j;
00227   string in_str;
00228   bool option_used;
00229   parameters p;
00230   data dat;
00231 
00232   // [ToDo]
00233 /*
00234   // store command line input for printing in impute() function
00235   for (i = 0; i < argc; ++i) {
00236     in_str = argv[i];
00237     p.cmd_call += " " + in_str;
00238   }
00239 */
00240 
00241   //////////////////////
00242   // INPUT PARAMETERS //
00243   //////////////////////
00244         vector<string> files;
00245         files = getOptVector("haplotype-file");
00246         p.haps_files.clear();
00247         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < files.size(); i++)
00248         {
00249                  p.haps_files.push_back(files[i]);
00250         }
00251 
00252         files = getOptVector("l");
00253         p.legend_files.clear();
00254         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < files.size(); i++)
00255         {
00256                  p.legend_files.push_back(files[i]);
00257         }
00258 
00259     p.gens_file = getOpt("g");
00260         p.map_file = getOpt("m");
00261 
00262         p.strand_file_g = getOpt("strand_g");
00263 
00264         // using diploid panel
00265         p.gens_file_ref = getOpt("g_ref"); // file containing reference panel genotypes
00266         p.strand_file_g_ref = getOpt("strand_g_ref");
00267 
00268         p.out_file = getOpt("output");
00269         p.o_gz = (getOptBool("o_gz") == true);
00270 
00271         string boundaries = getOpt("int");
00272         int spacePos = boundaries.find(" ");
00273         int boundariesLength = boundaries.length();
00274         string lowerBoundary = boundaries.substr(0, spacePos);
00275 
00276         while (boundaries[spacePos] == ' ' )
00277         {
00278                 spacePos++;
00279                 if (spacePos > boundariesLength)
00280                         break;
00281         }
00282 
00283         string upperBoundary = boundaries.substr(spacePos, boundaries.length() - spacePos);
00284 
00285         p.lower = atof(lowerBoundary.c_str());
00286         p.upper = atof(upperBoundary.c_str());
00287 
00288 
00289         p.Ne = getOptDouble("Ne");
00290 
00291         if (getOptDouble("buffer") != 0.0)
00292                 p.buffer = getOptDouble("buffer"); 
00293 
00294         if (getOpt("include_snps") != "")
00295         {
00296                 p.include_snps_file = getOpt("include_snps");
00297         }
00298 
00299         if (getOptInt("iter") != -1)
00300         {
00301                 p.n_mcmc_iter = getOptInt("iter");
00302         }
00303 
00304         if (getOptInt("k") != -1)
00305         {
00306                 p.n_cond_dip = getOptInt("k");
00307         }
00308 
00309   // if random seed has not been supplied manually, choose one at random using the system clock
00310         if (getOptInt("seed") == -1)
00311         {
00312                 srand(time(NULL));
00313                 seed = rand();
00314         }
00315         else
00316         {
00317                 seed = getOptInt("seed");
00318         }
00319 
00320         MT urng((double) seed / RAND_MAX);
00321         Random::Set(urng);
00322         p.seed = seed;
00323 
00324         dat.params = p;
00325 
00326         dat.impute();
00327 
00328         cout << endl << "Have a nice day!" << endl;
00329 //      return 0;
00330 }
